roleset.name: to bewilder, perplex
roleset.note: BAFFLE-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire (from baffle.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: He baffled her with his shallow smile and ready tongue, that twisted all topics to triviality.
example.arg: with his shallow smile and ready tongue, that twisted all topics to triviality.
